testcase.name: guard-rules-registry-all-rules.guard
testcase.failure: Guard Rule Set: guard-rules-registry-all-rules Controls: all rules in AWS Guard Rules Registry Violation: Inline policies are not allowed on IAM Users, Roles, or Groups. Fix: Remove the Policies list property from any IAM Users, Roles, or Groups. Check was not compliant as property [/Resources/CodeBuildServiceRole/Properties/Policies[L:109,C:8]] was not empty. Guard Rule Set: guard-rules-registry-all-rules Controls: all rules in AWS Guard Rules Registry Violation: Inline policies are not allowed on IAM Users, Roles, or Groups. Fix: Remove the Policies list property from any IAM Users, Roles, or Groups. Check was not compliant as property [/Resources/CloudWatchEventsRole/Properties/Policies[L:225,C:8]] was not empty.
